name: mrcepid-filterbcf
title: FilterBCF
summary: Filter a target BCF according to parameters set by MRC Epidemiology

inputSpec.name: input_vcfs
inputSpec.label: list of input .bcf file(s)
inputSpec.help: File containing list of input BCF files from mrcepid-splitbcf.

inputSpec.name: coordinates_name
inputSpec.label: Name of the output coordinates file
inputSpec.help: Name of the output coordinates file.

inputSpec.name: vep_cache
inputSpec.label: VEP cache from ENSEMBL
inputSpec.help: Pointer to the VEP cache stored on DNA nexus.

inputSpec.name: loftee_libraries
inputSpec.label: Precompiled LOFTEE resources
inputSpec.help: Pointer to the tar.gz file of loftee databases on DNA nexus

inputSpec.name: additional_annotations
inputSpec.help: List of tabix .tsv.gz files with additional annotations to add to the final bcf. See README for format.

inputSpec.name: gq
inputSpec.label: Minimum genotype quality
inputSpec.help: Minimum genotype quality to keep a genotype. Genotypes that fail this filter are set to './.' [10].

inputSpec.name: ad_binom
inputSpec.label: Minimum binomial p-value for binom(AD)
inputSpec.help: Filters heterozygous genotypes with ref / alt binomial p. value ≤ input value. Genotypes that fail this filter are set to './.' [0.001].

inputSpec.name: snp_depth
inputSpec.label: Minimum depth for SNPs
inputSpec.help: Minimum SNP depth (DP) to keep a SNP genotype. Genotypes that fail this filter are set to './.' [7].

inputSpec.name: indel_depth
inputSpec.label: Minimum depth for InDels
inputSpec.help: Minimum InDel depth (DP) to keep an InDel genotype. Genotypes that fail this filter are set to './.' [10].

inputSpec.name: missingness
inputSpec.label: Maximum missingness to keep a variant
inputSpec.help: Variants with missingness ≥ to input value are marked with a FAIL flag. Value should be given in decimal, not percentage, notation (i.e., 0.5 = 50%). Note that variants are retained from resulting outputs regardless of value [0.5].

inputSpec.name: wes
inputSpec.label: Use filtering parameters for WES
inputSpec.help: Use filtering parameters for WES data [false].

outputSpec.name: output_veps
outputSpec.label: Output VEP annotations
outputSpec.help: Tabix indexed TSV file(s) with per-variant annotation information

outputSpec.name: coordinates_file
outputSpec.label: Coordinates of each bcf processed by this job
outputSpec.help: Coordinates of each bcf processed by this job.
